faqs.title: Faqs
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get quick support with our faqs.

items.question: What is Income 25 BD?
items.answer: Income 25 BD is a professional network marketing platform designed to help you grow your business effortlessly with secure tools.

items.question: Is my data secure here?
items.answer: Yes, we use advanced encryption and 2FA security to ensure all your data and transactions are completely protected.

items.question: How do I sign up?
items.answer: Simply click the Get Started button, fill in your details, and you're ready to explore our investment plans.

items.question: Can I track my earnings?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our 3D dashboard provides real-time tracking of your commissions, deposits, and withdrawals.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including RazorPay, Stripe, and E-pins for your convenience.

items.question: How do I get customer support?
items.answer: Our support team is available 24/7. You can contact us through the Contact page or our support email.
